post_title: SOLD.     Raw lot, 1-2ish, Merkle, skies, stadiums
post_content:
Hey all,
Cleaning up the box a little to make a dent in my REA tab!

Here we have a fun little 7 card lot of raw cards including some stadiums, cool skies, Polar Bears, some creasing, two with writing, some wrinkles and stains.

Nice little lot on non beater set building cards.

Let’s do $$0ld  delivered, net to me. PayPal or Zelle work.

Hoping to get a nice group of HOFers listed later today, for sure graded but may have some raw too.

Thanks and drop me a PM if interested. Lots of goodies coming out of the box this weekend!

Enjoy,
Bob

Big price drop bump. I’m well in the red now but making some room in the box is worth it!

I’ve got a nice group of HOFers to get loaded up this evening, maybe a couple of fun backs too.

Thanks,
Bob

Bump for a price drop.
Thanks,
Bob

Big price drop bump.
Thanks,
Bob
